title: RESTRICTED ACCESS
fullText:
access restricted —
(a) by a barrier (e.g. by a perimeter fence or barrier with access only via a padlocked or equivalently secured gate or door)
(b) by location (e.g. roof where there is no fixed ladder or other ready means of access)
(c) by enclosure (e.g. cables in a wiring enclosure that are not accessible without the use of a tool)
(d) by installation height — greater than 2.5 m above the ground, floor or platform
